name: The Runaway Guys Pokemon Colosseum
description:
A Pokemon Boss Gauntlet Fangame based on the people at The Runaway Guys' Colosseum Charity Event for Direct Relief. 

Created by Rakhi (Samusnotmetroid) for the enjoyment of the various TRG communities.

**NOTE**
There are a few details of the game I need to iron out and a handful of sprites I need to remake like Emile and Jack. There will be an update to the game to add more polish. If you have any ideas that you would like to see in the game, I would love to hear them! Please put any thoughts in the comments below!

If you donate any money to this game, One, thank you so much for wanting to help support me and my game development adventures making all these silly games for The Runaway Guys communities. I adore the people behind these communities and everyone in them.  Second,  2/3 of the money that is donated will be donated to The Runaway Guys Direct Relief Colosseum to help support these wonderful people and the cause they hold every year.

If you don't have any money to burn, please just follow me on twitter https://twitter.com/samusnotmetroid so you can get some of the updates for any game I am working on such as the Outback Stabhouse development logs!

IF YOU HAVE FOUND A BUG OR ERROR, TELL ME ON TWITTER!

Controls!

"A" = C / Enter
"B" & "Menu" = X
Movement = Arrow Keys
